description: A perfect combination of wind protection and insulation: the Eisfeld SO Hybrid Hooded Jacket Men. With its extremely abrasion-proof and highly elastic soft shell double fabric, the jacket is perfect for various mountain-based activities such as mountaineering, climbing and ski tours. Primaloft® Gold insulation on the upper body and arms protects against overcooling. The Eisfeld SO Hybrid Hooded Jacket Men - robust and weatherproof.
name: Mammut Eisfeld SO Hybrid Hooded Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Polyamide Woven Double Weave - 93% Polyamide, 7% Elastene
